did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Collection of TV tie-in books,1945-1999,
1945-1999
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: 1,370 TV tie-in paperbacks and hardbacks about American TV shows from the beginning of TV in the 1940's to the turn of the century.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: 1,370 TV tie-in paperbacks and hardbacks about American TV shows from the beginning of TV in the 1940's to the turn of the century.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: TV Tie-in Book Collection, #8001. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
